inclusion.criterion: MCA stroke greater than 70cc in size
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with a midline shift > 1 mm
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Hemicraniectomy within 6 hours from initiation of hypertonic therapy

notes: Patient has significant bilateral carotid stenosis and a history of CVA, but no residual deficits. He is being evaluated for PVD.
